thread.title: Ravens QB Flacco won't need to adjust without Smith, others
thread.title_full: Ravens QB Flacco won't need to adjust without Smith, others

title: Ravens QB Flacco won't need to adjust without Smith, others
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Ravens QB Flacco won't need to adjust without Smith, others The absence of two veteran receivers and his go-to tight end won't change a thing for Ravens quarterback Joe Flacco. Post to Facebook Ravens QB Flacco won't need to adjust without Smith, others The absence of two veteran receivers and his go-to tight end won't change a thing for Ravens quarterback Joe Flacco.  //on.wusa9.com/1Lj3LJn   Join the Conversation To   Ravens QB Flacco won't need to adjust without Smith, others Associated Press, AP 10:53 p.m. EDT October 7, 2015 Oct 1, 2015; Pittsburgh, PA, USA; Baltimore Ravens quarterback Joe Flacco (5) passes the ball against the Pittsburgh Steelers during the first quarter at Heinz Field. Mandatory Credit: Charles LeClaire-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Charles LeClaire, Charles LeClaire-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
OWINGS MILLS, Md. (AP) - The absence of two veteran receivers and his go-to tight end won't change a thing for Baltimore Ravens quarterback Joe Flacco. 
Facing the Cleveland Browns on Sunday in an important AFC North matchup, the Ravens (1-3) will be without leading receiver Steve Smith and speedy Michael Campanaro, both of whom were injured last Thursday night in a win over the Steelers. 
Tight end Crockett Gilmore, who has 10 catches for 151 yards and two touchdowns, missed practice Wednesday with a strained calf. 
That leaves Flacco with less-heralded wide receivers Kamar Aiken, Marlon Brown and Chris Givens. The primary tight ends are rookies Maxx Williams and Nick Boyle. 
Flacco says, "It's my job to see whoever the guy is that's open and give him a chance to make the catch." CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE
